name: THE ALADDIN, 9 games in 1 file
description:
his listing is for one gb  Game 

 

  • Cartridge has menu screens for both cool Classics 211 (total of 46 games)
  • Cartridge is brand new, never played
  • Play and Stay feature - keep your game selected on next power up
  • Please see photos for the menu screenshots showing the complete list of games included
  • Works on most gameboy emulator/clone consoles. I tested it on 2 different gameboy emulator consoles I own and it played perfectly.
